swe2013.dao
Interface LocationDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlLocationDAO
public interface LocationDAO

Location DAO

Author:
Anreiter Simon, Moser Victoria Dorothy, Kocman Andreas Interface for storing and retrieval of location data (hotels and cities)

               City city,
               long ownerID)
saves a new hotel

Parameters:

ownerID - the ID of the account of the owner of the hotel

freeRoomsForTimeFrame

long[] freeRoomsForTimeFrame(long hotelID,
                             java.util.Date beginDate,
                             java.util.Date endDate,
                             int beds,
                             int price)
returns all free rooms within a certain time frame in a hotel

Parameters:
hotelID - the ID of the hotel
beginDate - the begin of the timeframe/date of arrival
endDate - the end of the timeframe/date of departure
beds - number of beds necessary
price - the highest price
Returns:
array of room IDs free in a certain hotel

hotelsWithFreeRooms

long[] hotelsWithFreeRooms(java.util.Date beginDate,
                           java.util.Date endDate,
                           int beds,
                           int price)
returns all hotels with free rooms for a certain time frame

Parameters:
beginDate - the begin of the timeframe/date of arrival
endDate - the end of the timeframe/date of departure
beds - number of beds necessary
price - the highest price
Returns:
array of hotel IDs of hotels with free rooms

freeHotelsSummary

java.lang.String[][] freeHotelsSummary(java.lang.String cityname,
                                       java.lang.String countryname,
                                       java.util.Date beginDate,
                                       java.util.Date endDate,
                                       java.lang.Integer beds,
                                       java.lang.Integer price)
returns a summary of all hotels and rooms within a specific city

Parameters:
cityname - the name of the city
countyname - the name of the country the city is in
beginDate - the begin of the timeframe/date of arrival
endDate - the end of the timeframe/date of departure
beds - number of beds necessary
price - the highest price
Returns:
array of all hotel IDs with free rooms and the room IDs of these rooms
